actions.name: ***Horns.***
actions.action: *Melee Weapon Attack:* +5 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. *Hit* 9 piercing (1d8 + 4)

actions.name: ***Stomp.***
actions.action: *Area Attack:* All enemies in 10ft radius make Strength saving throw. On failed save take 20 (4d8) bludgeoning. Successful save for half damage.
